list.abs: research on foreign trade policy under the threat of stagflation ., 滞胀威胁下的我国对外经济政策研究.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: blend of stagnation (see stagnate) and inflation

entry.def: If an economy is suffering from stagflation, inflation is high but there is no increase in the demand for goods or in the number of people who have jobs.

means.word_mean: 1. a period of slow economic growth and high unemployment (stagnation) while prices rise (inflation)
